answers.author: Jose Machicao
answers.text:
In Peru, we raised a legislation for public-private partnerships only two years ago. The main barrier is the lack of methodologies to articulate responsibilities because the Public Authority makes a double role: contractor and supervisor, thus many times the goals are not achieved because the Public Authority delays its own schedule.

author: Emily Dodson
text:
With all of the fiscal challenges facing communities today, public-private partnerships can be effective means to reaching your goals.
Do you know if your community has engaged in a public-private partnership? If so, what do public-private partnerships look like in your community?
title: Engaging the Private Sector
